info.what: Allows developers to enforce that image/video elements have explicit dimensions. If dimensions aren't specified on the element, the browser sets a default size of 300x150 when this policy is active.
info.why: Reduces the layout work the browser has to perform.
info.instructions: Click the enable/disable buttons above to see how the page loads with the policy enabled/disabled. When the policy is enabled, you won't see layout thrashing as large images without sizes load and reflow text on the page.
